description:
11.100 format
Convert the input video to one of the specified pixel formats.
Libavfilter will try to pick one that is suitable as input to
the next filter.

It accepts the following parameters:
name: format

options.description: A ’|’-separated list of pixel format names, such as "pix_fmts=yuv420p|monow|rgb24".
options.name: pix_fmts
